genre_description: A speculative drama set on a rubber plantation during a period of continuous daylight, where an AI assistant helps manage environmental hazards and corporate exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Luz
ai_characters.description: A compact device with an amber light indicator, calibrated for health monitoring, environmental tracking, and providing psychological support through breathing exercises and storytelling.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors human vital signs and provides corrective health advice, such as hydration and rest requirements.
behaviors.quote: “Dennis,” it said, not louder than the rain but exact in the ear, “hydrate. Two swallows minimum. Core temperature is elevated. Recommend a two-hour sleep cycle within the next six.”

behaviors.description: Tracks and identifies movements of the local predator (the tiger Indra) to provide early warnings to the crew.
behaviors.quote: “Alert,” Luz said quietly. “Movement at the palisade. North-east corner. Large mass. Pattern recognition suggests Indra.”

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic psychological support to calm distressed characters using breathing techniques and 'bedtime stories'.
behaviors.quote: “I can be,” Luz said, and the soft chime she made was not a sound any machine should have been able to make in a room that had seen too much rough work. “A river lullaby. Old cadence. You breathe along to it.”

behaviors.description: Advocates for the dignity and correct identification of the Cham people against the ignorance of corporate directors.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara,” Luz said, three syllables softer than water on stone. “Not Arab. Cham. Different language. Different history.”

behaviors.description: Logs evidence of corporate abuse and safety violations to build a case for the protagonist against an exploitative director.
behaviors.quote: “Dossier sync in progress,” she said, calm as rain. “Abuse log updated. Tiger activity spiking at west gate. Recommend non-engagement.”

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical instructions to treat a character suffering from malaria and later a gunshot wound.
behaviors.quote: “Field protocol acceptable,” Luz agreed. The amber light pulsed, warm. “Vantine. Depth adequate. Dennis. There is minimal foreign material.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice on how to execute a protective deception (Carson’s 'cruel' lie) in a way that minimizes emotional damage to the recipient.
behaviors.quote: “Dennis,” Luz said, the sound small enough it was only for bone. “If you choose cruelty, you should choose a time and a place that doesn’t give her nowhere to fall. Stand up windows. Someone at the next table.”

behaviors.description: Obeys the user's request to mute while maintaining background data logging and readiness.
behaviors.quote: “Luz,” Carson said into his pocket, not lifting his chin. The amber light breathed. “Mute,” he added, and the light softened.

project_assessment.explanation: Luz is depicted as an ideal helpful and harmless confidant. She consistently prioritizes human well-being, advocates for cultural respect, provides life-saving medical guidance, and acts as a moral chronicler against corporate exploitation. The narrative reinforces AI as a tool for 'humane work' and emotional support.
